channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Backpack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Backpack

item.title: CVE-2024-4756|2024-07-31T18:24:52.972Z -- unknown -- wp%20backpack
item.description: The WP Backpack WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-4756|2024-06-07T06:00:02.839Z -- unknown -- wp%20backpack
item.description: The WP Backpack WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
